abstrac: Excellent Mobile and Web Developer, Pattern recognition and Image Processing Expert.
bio:
Thanks for reviewing my profile.
I'm an experienced frontend developer in modern Javascript - React, Redux, ES6.
Also I've worked as a backend developer (Java + Spring / Scala + Akka). I have also created and published many mobile applications for last 7 years.

I have created over 8 react native apps, most of which required custom designed plugins and extensions.

My skills : 
- Swift, Objective-C, Java
- React Native, React JS with Redux.
- AngularJS, Nativescript, Bootstrap
- Node.JS, .NET, Spring framework
- Web Front-End, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript.
- Backend: Firebase, Heroku, AWS

I'm working on the bleeding edge of Javascript (ES6+, React, Redux, HTML5, CSS3) technologies. Let’s face it, the benefits of IT outsourcing are numerous, and I'm here to help you avail all these benefits. 

I place special emphasis on customers’ satisfaction. I guarantee the development of upmarket products created in conformity with your requirements. Achieving this is possible only by means of a tight cooperation with customers throughout the entire process of a project’s development. 

I understand how important it is to create products that can be easily adjusted to the quickly changing market requirements. To help you withstand a tough competition of your target market, I use only the most powerful tools and technologies that allow me developing performant software solutions. 

I work with numerous advanced technologies and guarantee a complete dedication to each project. 

If you are looking for a reliable, creative and experienced IT professional, you have come to the right place, as I will eagerly become your longtime partner. Let's work!
Best regards.

I like working on projects with a team that cares about creating beautiful and usable interfaces.
I'm flexible with my working hours and I'm happy to work closely with any existing freelancers you work with.
I look forward to hearing from you!!!

bio:
Who We are

Trumpakt Technologies Private Limited is client-focused engineering center promoted by a group of Engineers and Technocrats, having quality enriched experience in the IT industry. Since 2009 as a private limited company headquartered at Noida, Gautam Budha Nagar, India.

The collaborated affords of Trumpakt team has expanded the company business throughout the globe. In a short duration company has started two new branchesone in NOIDA and another in Dallas, USA.

What We Do

We Offers website designing, website development, Search Engine Optimization, Software Development, Website Promotion, Domain + Hosting services, Hardware and Networking Support Services at very reasonable cost with maintaining the Quality of Service (QoS) issues.

Why Us

There are various reasons why you should choose US; some of the reasons opted by our existing clients are:

We provide high quality solutions in a time and cost effective way
We meet the clients’ needs, expectations and budget.

abstrac: OrahSoft - Solution for all your computer needs
bio:
Web Applications, Windows Applications, Database application, Object Oriented programming, .NET Framework, ASP.NET, Windows.Forms, ADO.NET,Access and VBA, Google Gadgets, Localized applications
OrahSoft - is the solution for all your software needs. 
We designs high quality software. We provides various information technology (IT) solutions and services, offers business consulting services, such as business engineering and performance management, application development and maintenance, web defelopment, and enterprise application services.

Payment Method: We would like to work with employers, who
agree to use the SafePay Escrow service (especially when working with an employer for the first time).
Communication: The best whay to communicate by email or by IM. If we need to be reached immediately or discuss something, which cannot be handled over the email - phone is also OK.
General Availability: We are available any time Mon-Fri, and Sun 8 am-10 pm Pacific Time. We are NOT available Saturdays.
